availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky farmer. Virginia native. Married to Martha Glore. Father of Adeline Glore, Amanda Glore, Sandford Glore, Mary Glore, William Glore, John Glore, Sarah Glore and Samuel Glore. Farmer in 1850, 1860 and 1870 in Franklin County.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 94B
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 351
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Benson, p. 34B
